name: PoliticsDailyBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to up-to-date news in politics with a balance of liberal and conservative views from top news sources nationwide. Visit Politicopathy.com for more. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
